title: Riot pls

embed.description: v3.0.1 (14th March, 2016) Fixed a small issue with the "Set all to" button under "Select champions" v3.0.0 (13th March, 2016) Custom announcer installation now available. Please note that if you want to use a custom announcer pack (like Sneaky & Meteos) WITH a different language for champion VO, install the different language VO first, then install the custom announcer.

body:
Permaban right off the bat... why? hmm lets read " malicious 3rd party programs or modifications to your League of Legends client " ok fine i admit i do have a third party software running ( link above) its a VO for league in game which according to riot is ok. Quote "As an update to this, we're not banning for any VO replacements, but as with every other modification to League of Legends, anything you change is at your own risk." From Rioter Draggles EUW server and 
Fine:
- Any software that does not interfere directly with the in-game player experience between when you press “Play” and the end of game screen. VO mods are fine, they're localised to you and they don't give an advantage to your team.

Not fine:
- Exposing information that’s intentionally obfuscated (cooldowns or timers)
- Taking actions on your behalf (botting or scripting)
- Drawing conclusions for you (predicting enemy positions)
- Otherwise altering your field of intelligence (zoomhacks or global ult alerts)

From the Ts and Cs. I have no other softwares open when i play league. Nothing. When i play league all i have open is league and maybe hearthstone. I feel like this ban is falsely put on me. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}  If u guys want to see a video of my desktop and an in game view of what i usually run i would be happy to film myself. I have sent 2 tickets to riot and would like to see progress happening. I have only played this game for about a year now and am almost to silver 5. With the arrival of URF game mode coming soon which i have yet to test myself as i joined in July of 2015 i would really wish my innocent would lift my falsely claimed ban.
